DESCRIPTION: Whenever you collect this item, give a copy to each player currently in the game.
Moves this item to the given player until the end of combat.
Permanently moves this item to the given player.
Taunted monsters do 10% less damage to other players but 10% more damage to the player that taunted them, per stack of Taunt applied.
Each stack of insanity gives you 3% chance to damage a random ally instead of the intended target. Decreases by 1 at the end of each turn.
If all players have Full Charge power, do 10 damage per player at the end of turn and remove the power.
If the target has no orb slots when channeling, gain an orb slot.
Die at the end of combat.
If the player you're bound to dies, die.
Whenever you deal damage with a card to a monster with this power, gain 1 gold.
